comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4017172482/]
Mrs. Haviland H. Lund is the head of the Forward-to-the-Land League which ... Mrs. Lund advises city men to go to the suburbs and cultivate a piece of land ... 
Source: The Hartford Courant ; August 21, 1913
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4017172908]

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Joseph N. Francolini was a delegate to the Forward-to-the-Land League Convention, appointed by Governer Sulzer of New York. The Convention was held Aug. 6-9 in Boston, according to NYT of August 2, 1913 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9807E0DD163DE633A... Presumably the middle woman is his wife. Mrs. Slack's spectacular costume does not seem ideal for the farm!!
